messages.messageBody:
The Zatoichi film also stars Tadanobu Asano of Gohatto and Gojoe
fame.

Jiro/Saitou

and

channel

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: Anyone know this film?

messages.messageBody:
secretary wrote:

>aha!
>I ~think~ this is the film some of the ladies at 3-hajime.com were
>discussing. If it is the same exact film then Yamaguchi Jiro/Saitou
>Hajime is actually in this film. Where are you getting this info?
>
>
Shocked you guys that I actually know something for a change huh?
*Grin* Actually somene sent me an email asking if I'd heard of it and
if it was available on dvd or anything.

On a semi-related note---I just saw a commercial on the IFC channel
that Zatoichi --the Blind Swordsman movie with Takashi Kitano is coming
out in theaters this summer! And it looks mighty darn good.

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Re: Anyone know this film?
messages.msgSnippet: aha! I ~think~ this is the film some of the ladies at 3-hajime.com were discussing.  If it is the same exact film then Yamaguchi Jiro/Saitou Hajime is actually
messages.messageBody:
aha!
I ~think~ this is the film some of the ladies at 3-hajime.com were
discussing. If it is the same exact film then Yamaguchi Jiro/Saitou
Hajime is actually in this film. Where are you getting this info?

No

Bakuku)?
>
> It's about the Byakkotai.
